price: 无论你们争论什么事，都要归安拉判决。那是安拉，是我的主，我只托靠他，我只归依他。
arabic: وَمَا ٱخۡتَلَفۡتُمۡ فِيهِ مِن شَيۡءٖ فَحُكۡمُهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُ وَإِلَيۡهِ أُنِيبُ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā ikh'talaftum fīhi min shayin faḥuk'muhu ilā al-lahi dhālikumu al-lahu rabbī ʿalayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi unību
